channel.name: CBC News CA
channel.title: Live: Cross Country Check-up with Ian Hanomansing
channel.desc: A lively discussion on an issue of national interest, hosted by Ian Hanomansing.

channel.name: CBC News CA
channel.title: CBC Newsroom with Deana Sumanac-Johnson

channel.name: CBC News CA
channel.title: The Fifth Estate
channel.desc: Canadian animation pioneer Daniel Langlois was known for films like the Matrix and Jurassic Park. When the millionaire and his partner were killed in Dominica last December, it exposed a web that extends into politics and corruption.
